dsutils.memory



alias Svmem = std.typecons.Tuple!(int, "total", int, "free", int, "buffer", int, "cached", int, "freeTotal", int, "inUse").Tuple;
Virtual Memory related

Svmem contains informations about virtual memory.

Svmem mem();
Returns:
a Svmem tuple

int memTreat(string line);
Parse a line from /proc/meminfo

Params:
string line a line of /proc/meminfo

Returns:
the value in this line

int toMB(int value);
Convert a value from /proc/meminfo in mega-bytes

Params:

Returns:
the converted value

int memToPercent(Svmem mem, int value);
Convert a value from /proc/meminfo in a percentage of the total memory

Params:
Svmem mem a Svmem tuple
int value a value to convert

Returns:
a percentage

alias Swap = std.typecons.Tuple!(long, "total", long, "used", long, "free", int, "percent", long, "sin", long, "sout").Tuple;
This tuple contains information about swap memory

Swap swapMemory();
Informations about swap memory

Returns:
a Swap tuple.

Throws:
an exception if sin and sout have not been found (their values in the tuple have been set to zero).
